dialogue.text: I knew you were good,  but I had no idea you were this good!
Well,  he was able to win over Daddy and Mommy's approval.
Well Renko,  what do you think?  Do you think they're deserving of being in the club.
I think one more song should prove their worth!  Though letâ€™s make this one a duet!
Without a moment's hesitation,  Renko hops into Maribel's arms,  catching the blonde foreigner by surprise
R-Renko!  Warn me next time!  I could've dropped you!
Like that could happen!  You always have my back Merry!  When I'm around you,  I feel like I'm invincible!
Sigh, you can't always rely on me Renko.
Get your arms ready honey!  Because here I come
